9. samaṇavaggo
1, bhikkhusuttaṃ vaggāsaṅgahitā suttantā
Sattannaṁ bhikkhave dhammānaṁ bhinnattā bhikkhu hoti. Katamesaṁ sattannaṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhi bhinnā hoti vicikicchā bhinnā hoti sīlabbataparāmāso bhinno hoti rāgo bhinno hoti doso bhinno hoti moho bhinno hoti māno bhinno hoti. Imesaṁ kho bhikkhave sattannaṁ dhammānaṁ bhinnattā bhikkhu hotīti.
2, samaṇasuttaṃ
Sattannaṁ bhikkhave dhammānaṁ samitattā samaṇo hoti
3, brāhmaṇasuttaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo hoti
4, sottiyasuttaṃ nissuttattā sottiko Ma. sotthiyo. hoti
5, nhātakasuttaṃ
Nahātattā nahātako hoti
6, vedagūsuttaṃ
viditattā vedagū hoti
7, ariyasuttaṃ
Ma. ārakattā ariyo hoti. ārakattā arahā hoti.
8, arahāsuttaṃ Katamesaṁ sattannaṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhi ārakā hoti vicikicchā ārakā hoti sīlabbataparāmāso ārako hoti rāgo ārako hoti doso ārako hoti moho ārako hoti māno ārako hoti. Imesaṁ kho bhikkhave sattannaṁ dhammānaṁ ārakattā arahā hotīti.
9, asaddhammasuttaṃ
Sattime bhikkhave asaddhammā. Katame satta assaddho hoti ahiriko hoti anottappī hoti appassuto hoti kusīto hoti muṭṭhassati hoti duppañño hoti. Ime kho bhikkhave satta asaddhammā.
10, saddhammasuttaṃ Sattime bhikkhave saddhammā. Katame satta saddho hoti hirimā hoti ottappī hoti bahussuto hoti āraddhaviriyo hoti satimā hoti paññavā hoti. Ime kho bhikkhave satta saddhammāti.
